contribute_by_share_text: You Can Always Help By Being Love

header.title: All Attention is All You Need For Web3 Marketing
header.subtitle: A revolutionary approach to capture universal attention by giving 1% of profits to every human being on Earth. Transform consumers into stakeholders and build the world's most inclusive brand community.

benefits.title: Universal Relevance
benefits.description: Every human becomes personally invested in your success when they directly benefit from your profits. This creates 8 billion potential advocates instead of competing for market segments.

benefits.title: Viral by Design
benefits.description: A self-propagating marketing strategy where everyone has a financial incentive to promote your brand organically. No advertising budget is needed - the entire world markets for you.

benefits.title: Emotional Connection
benefits.description: Transcend product features by positioning your brand as a force for global good and human dignity. This fosters unbeatable brand loyalty and premium pricing power.

benefits.title: Media Magnetism
benefits.description: Journalists can't ignore a business model that benefits everyone on the planet. Guaranteed press coverage and organic social media buzz.

implementation_guide.title: How Blockchain Infrastructure Could Make It Possible
implementation_guide.subtitle: Transparent, global profit distribution through blockchain and ZK-proof systems.

steps.title: ZK Human Personalhood
steps.subtitle: World Citizen Verification
steps.description: Zero-Knowledge proof system for private, verifiable World Citizen identity. This enables universal profit distribution while protecting user privacy and preventing Sybil attacks.

steps.title: Smart Contract Airdrop
steps.subtitle: Automated Profit Distribution
steps.description: Build transparent smart contracts for automatic 1% profit sharing. Execute a massive airdrop campaign to verified World Citizens.

steps.title: DAO Governance
steps.subtitle: Community-Driven Growth
steps.description: Launch a Decentralized Autonomous Organization where token holders vote on marketing campaigns. Incentivize viral growth through Web3 referral systems and NFT rewards.

proof_of_concept.title: Proof of Concept: Toy Examples
proof_of_concept.subtitle: Awaiting Empowerment from Big Players
proof_of_concept.disclaimer: These are personal development projects exploring Web3 and DUKI implementation.

projects.name: knowunownable.love
projects.description: A divination platform as the first example of Web3 spiritual services, combining ancient wisdom with modern blockchain technology.

projects.name: Unstoppable.limo
projects.description: A Web2 gateway for Unstoppable Domains (in progress). Similar to the .limo service, but specifically for Unstoppable domain names.

projects.name: ichingdao.love
projects.description: An I Ching-based DAO platform combining ancient Chinese wisdom with modern decentralized governance (work in progress).

projects.name: WLFI Proposal
projects.description: An evolutionary marketing strategy proposal for World Liberty Financial, demonstrating DUKI principles in DeFi applications.

projects.name: More Powerful Projects From You
projects.description: Projects that push the boundaries of what's possible with Web3 technology and DUKI principles.

call_to_action.title: Ready to Transform Your Marketing?
call_to_action.description: DUKI isn't just about profit-sharing‚Äîit's about creating the most powerful value proposition in human history. When everyone wins, everyone advocates for your success.
call_to_action.tagline: Give 1% to All ‚Üí Gain Universal Support ‚Üí Make All Great Again
